attributes.action: demand Holly Willoughby attend the Gentlemen of Moore annual dinner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Holly is Fab, friendly and got great assets. holly would be an excellent addition to any dinner party, but would be of particular value to our annual dinner. prime minister, I ask you to compel her to attend

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
